description.en:
Yue Ling and Chong Yao are both trained under Tai Shang Xian Jun, they get along really well until Chong Yao inherited the throne of the Emperor. Everything seems to have changed since then... 
Vicious but loyal Emperor X Gentle water god.
description.zh: 月凌和重耀共同拜在太上仙君门下，师兄师弟一直相处和谐，直到重耀继承天帝之位，一切都好像变了……腹黑忠犬天帝X温柔清冷水神。

title.en: A Former Delinquent Girl Falls in Love

description.en: Spin-off/Spiritual Sequel of the authors other work "The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other"; with this story focusing on the mask wearing former delinquent and her budding romance with the little brother of the Female MC of the previous work.

My bias is the City God! It's a story about how a non mainstream boy with unfortunate genetics causes all sorts of trouble in a peaceful city while chasing after the City God... "It doesn't matter if they're a ghost or a monster, nothing can stop my bias Xuming God! Not even the God himself!"

Playing Dumb Sterella Brother vs Beautiful, Strong, Miserable White Dragon Brother. Top Omegan white dragon Shou Yue killed the mafia boss, Si Xian, but saved his only son -- Si Mojue, and raised him like a younger brother. Unbeknownst to him, Si Mojue was an Alpha Sterella, only playing the part of a nice brother in front of Shou Yue, doing his best to become the person closest to him to avenge his father's death... An avenger, a murderer, and when the secret is revealed, what will they do?

At a certain prison under the surface, the "bottom of the bottom" that is the Teiai Underground Labor Facility, there is a man who uses his "one-day outing passes" to go above ground and enjoy all the luxuries of life while living in the poor conditions of the underground. His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

altTitles.en: Roxana: The Way to Protect the Female Lead's Older Brother
The Way to Protect the Female Lead's Older Brother
How to Protect the Heroine's Older Brother

altTitles.vi: Cách để bảo vệ anh trai của Nữ chính

altTitles.es: Cómo proteger al hermano mayor de la heroína

altTitles.ru: Как защитить старшего брата главной героини

altTitles.fa: راهی برای نجات برادر بزرگ‌ترِ شخصیت اولِ زن

altTitles.zh: 保护女主角哥哥的方法

altTitles.zh-hk: 保護女主角哥哥的方法

description.en:
Kidnapping, murder, and risqué relationships! Within the scandalous pages of *The Abysmal Flower*, the downfall of Roxana Agrece's criminal family is already foretold. So when Cassis Pedelian, the heroine’s older brother, is kidnapped by Roxana's father, she can either wait for the heroine's revenge... or take matters into her own hands, since Cassis is the key to her survival. But with deceitful characters on all sides, can Roxana and Cassis trust each other enough to bring down the brutal Agreces?

---
I accidentally took possession of someone in a 19+ reverse harem novel.

The problem is that I became Roxanna Agriche, the older sister of the sub-villain. My damn father kidnapped the heroine's brother. Now, is the only thing left to meet a terrible end from the vengeance of the heroine?

But what if I can avoid that horrible development?

“I'm also interested in this toy.”

"I'll protect you until you can get out of here safely."

The heroine's brother, Cassis Pedalian, will definitely be able to pay me back later.

---

**Note:** Please be advised. This work contains somewhat sadistic expressions and portrayals of bloodshed due to the nature of the genre. There are images that may make you feel a little uncomfortable, so please take note. Additionally, this is **not** smut; it's just R15.

**Links:**
- [Official Indonesian/Bahasa Indonesia Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
- [Official Japanese/日本語 Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.fr:
Enlèvements, meurtres, et relations risquées! Dans les pages scandaleuses de *La fleur abyssale*, la chute de la famille criminelle de Roxana Agrece est déjà annoncée. Ainsi, lorsque Cassis Pedelian, le frère aîné de l'héroïne, est kidnappé par le père de Roxana, elle peut soit attendre la vengeance de l'héroïne... soit prendre les choses en main, puisque Cassis est la clé de sa survie. Mais avec des personnages trompeurs de tous les côtés, Roxana et Cassis peuvent-ils se faire suffisamment confiance pour faire tomber les brutales Agrece?

---
Traductions officielles:
* [Anglais / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Indonésien / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Japonais / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.id:
Aku tidak sengaja merasuki seseorang dalam novel harem terbalik 19+.  Masalahnya adalah aku menjadi Roxana Agriche, kakak dari sub-penjahat itu. Ayahku menculik saudara pemeran utama wanita itu. Sekarang, apakah satu-satunya hal yang tersisa untuk menemui akhir yang mengerikan dari pembalasan pemeran utama wanita? Tetapi bagaimana jika aku dapat menghindari perkembangan yang mengerikan itu?  “Aku juga tertarik dengan mainan ini.”  "Aku akan melindungimu sampai kamu bisa keluar dari sini dengan selamat."

---
Official Translations:
* [Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Bahasa Inggris / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Bahasa Jepang / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.it:
Accidentalmente mi sono reincarnata in un personaggio in un romanzo di harem inverso per maggiorenni. Il problema è che sono diventata Roxana Agriche, la sorella maggiore del cattivo. Il mio dannato padre ha poi rapito il fratello dell'eroina. Ora cosa ci rimane per incontrare una fine terribile e la vendetta dell'eroina? Ma cosa dovrei fare per evitare quest'orribile sviluppo? "Anche io sono interessata a questo giocattolo." "Ti proteggerò, finché non potrai uscire di qui sano e salvo." Il fratello dell'eroina, Cassis Fedelian, potrà sicuramente ripagarmi più tardi.

---
Official Translations:
* [Giapponese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
* [Indonesiano / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Inglese / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
description.ja:
どういう訳か小説の中の悪の一族、アグリチェ一家の娘「ロクサナ」に生まれ変わっていた！ アグリチェは人殺しをものともしない残虐非道な一族で、ロクサナもまたその一族の一人。 そして物語は、ロクサナの父「ラント」がある男を拉致してきた場面から始まる。 その拉致されてきた男は、アグリチェ一族とは対極のぺデリアン一族のプリンス「カシス」だった。 アグリチェ一族の誰もがカシスを殺そうとする中、ロクサナだけは唯一家族を騙してでも必死に救おうとする。 最初はロクサナを警戒していたカシスも徐々に心を開き始め…。

---
Official Translations:
* [日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
* [英語 / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [インドネシア語 / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
description.ko:
어쩌다 보니 19금 역하렘 소설에 빙의했다.

문제는 내가 악역 서브남의 누나가 되었다는 건데... 망할 아버지가 기어이 여자 주인공의 오빠를 납치해 왔다. 이제 여주인공의 가문에 복수 당해 몰락할 일만 남은 건가. 아아, 데드 플래그 피하기 진짜 힘들다.

"이번 장난감에는 저도 흥미가 있어요."

오빠, 이렇게 된 이상 내가 지켜줄게요.

그러니까 이 은혜는 나중에 꼭 갚아요, 알았죠?

---
Official Translations:
* [영어 / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [인도네시아어 / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [일본어 / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.ru:
Я переродилась в новелле 19+ с реверс-гаремом.

Проблема в том, что я стала старшей сестрой второго, злого главного героя… Мой чертов отец в конце концов похитил старшего брата главной героини. Теперь осталось только дожидаться мести от главной героини и разрушения рода? Ах, избежать смертельной концовки и правда тяжело.

"Я тоже заинтересована в этой игрушке."

Раз уж так вышло, то я тебя защищу. Поэтому обязательно отплати мне той же монетой, понял?

---
Official Translations:
* [Английский / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Индонезийский / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Японский / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.tr:
Bir 19+ ters harem romanının içine girdim.

Sorun şu ki, kötü adamın ablası Roxana Agriche oldum. Lanet babam, kahramanın kardeşini kaçırdı. Şimdi, kahramanın intikamından dolayı korkunç bir sonla karşılaşmak geriye kalan tek şey mi?

Ama ya bu korkunç gelişmeden kaçınırsam?

“Buradan sağ salim çıkana kadar seni koruyacağım.”

Kahramanın kardeşi Cassis Pedalian kesinlikle onun için yaptıklarımı daha sonra geri ödeyecek.

---
Official Translations:
* [Endonezce / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [İngilizce / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Japonca / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.pt-br:
Eu acidentalmente possui alguém em uma novel de harém reverso +19.
O problema é que eu me tornei Roxana Agriche, a irmã mais nova do sub-vilão. Meu maldito pai sequestrou o irmão da heroína.
Agora, a única coisa que me resta é encontrar um final terrível da vingança da heroína?
Mas e se eu puder evitar esse acontecimento?
“Eu também estou interessada nesse brinquedo.”
“Eu vou protegê-lo até que possa sair daqui a salvo.”
O irmão da heroína, Cassis Pedalian, vai definitivamente conseguir me retribuir depois.

---
Official Translations:
* [Inglês / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Indonésio / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Japonês / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.

description.en:
The Bloody, Murderous Ghoul, the Mad Dog of the Battlefield…
The countless nicknames of Libertisha, who was driven into war from a young age.

After the war ended, she received an offer to marry a duke, and her partner was...

"Who the hell are you? Get lost."

Little did she know it would be a child!

They were eventually wed after many trials and tribulations. However, during a mission she became trapped in an unknown space. Once she finally made it out, ten years had passed outside.

But now...

"Stay with me, Leti."

Where did my little kitten-like husband go? Now my all-grown-up husband is obsessed with me?!

altTitles.en: The Stain of the Trapped Beast

description.en: Once a prince of a fallen nation, but due to the defeat in war, he could only be reduced as a prisoner and become plaything for the powerful people of the victorious nation. Xing Mu, who endured the humiliation and disguised himself as an Omega, was on a mission of revenge and restoration of his homeland. However, his biggest obstacle was the helpless second prince of the enemy nation — a beautiful omega who was marked by him in an accident. Therefore, the love and hate between the two, accompanied by the dark surge of revenge, tightly entangled together...
description.pl: Kiedyś należał do rodziny królewskiej, lecz jego kraj poniósł solidną porażkę. Mógł tylko zostać jeńcem dla potężnych ludzi zwycięskiego kraju, aby mogli się zabawić jego kosztem. Xing Mu, mimo iż czuł upokorzenie, przebrał się za Omegę, by móc się zemścić i odbudować swój kraj. Jednakże... Najważniejszą przeszkodą, jaką musiał pokonać, był drugi książę wroga, Hill, którego przez przypadek oznaczył, czyniąc z niego jego Omegę. W tym momencie miłość i nienawiść między dwojgiem ludzi są ściśle splecione z nurtem zemsty....

altTitles.ro: Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo: Chemarea Moscovei

description.en:
Moscow Calling takes place in Russia in 2000. This story is about Georgiy Lastochkin, an 18-year old Russian student with mysterious stand. Living in Vladivostok, he studies at a local university, and happens to have a crush on one of his classmates. On one end he has to deal with his everyday life as a student - on the other, he needs to deal with the mysteries of his Stand.  
  
One day he begins travelling throughout Russia, all the way from Vladivostok to Moscow! There are sure to be faithful friends and clever enemies, comedy and drama, and of course - Stand battles. Learn what it means to be a Russian Stand user in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Moscow Calling!  
  
Italian summary:  
||Moscow Calling è ambientato nella Russia del 2000. Il protagonista di questa storia è Georgiy Lastochkin, uno studente diciottenne russo con uno stand misterioso. Visto che vive a Vladivostok, studia all'università locale, e si prende una cotta per una delle sue compagne di corso. Da una parte deve affrontare la sua vita da studente - dall'altra, deve avere a che fare con i misteri del suo stand.  
  
Un giorno inizia a viaggiare per tutta la Russia, da Vladivostok a Mosca! Incontrerà dei fedeli amici e dei nemici intelligenti, una drammatica commedia, e ovviamente - battaglie con stand. Impara cosa significa essere un portatore di stand russo in Le bizzarre avventure di Jojo: la chiamata di Mosca!||
description.vi:
Chào mừng đến với Vladivostok, thủ phủ vùng liên bang Viễn Đông, L.B.Nga. "Moscow Calling" kể về Georgiy Lastochkin, một sinh viên 18 tuổi. Sống ở Vladivostok, cậu học tại một trường đại học địa phương với cuộc sống bình thường như bao sinh viên khác.
Một ngày nọ, cậu bắt đầu hành trình của mình đi khắp nước Nga, hành trình từ Vladivostok đến tận Moskva!

description.en:
Back then, it was not only the two of us.
Me, you, and him.

That guy, who always hovered in the periphery of my first love Omega's sight, was an Alpha without pheromones.
The winner of that first love was naturally me, the Alpha with pheromones,
And now, that guy, Seong Jewon, is just another member of our friend group.

I thought our days would continue to pass by peacefully,
But when I got my hands on a candle that can recreate any desired pheromone,
Our relationship began to flow in an unexpected direction.

I thought I was recalling the pheromone of my first love,
But why is it that I remember that guy more clearly?
Can someone tell me why?

altTitles.en: If You Corrupt the Heroine's First Love
Corrupting Your Heroine's First Love Will Result With This

description.en:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?

The secret of the record left by my grandfather, the underground record shop dealing with forbidden pop music, and the old jukebox in the diner of the near future. A collection of short stories that traces the memories and feelings contained in the records.
description.ja: 祖父の遺したレコードの秘密、禁制のポップ音楽を扱う地下レコード店、近未来のダイナーにおかれた古びたジュークボックス。レコードに込められた記憶と想いを辿る短篇集。

description.en:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?
(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)
Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. 
But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
A totally not "bad" delinquent girl's 4-koma school life manga!

altTitles.en: Wotakoi: Love Is Hard for Otaku

altTitles.id: Cinta itu Sulit untuk Seorang Otaku

altTitles.es: Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku

altTitles.pl: Wotakoi. Miłość jest trudna dla otaku

altTitles.pt-br: Wotakoi: O amor é difícil para otakus

altTitles.th: ยากแท้จริงหนอรักของโอตาคุ

description.de:
Narumi ist ein Vollblut-Nerd. Doch ihre Liebe zu Manga und Anime trifft bei Normalo-Männern nicht gerade auf Verständnis – sobald sie hinter ihr Geheimnis kommen, nehmen sie Reißaus! Zum Glück bietet sich ihr alter Kindheitsfreund Hirotaka – selbst hoffnungsloser Game-Nerd – als Freund an. Aber kann die Rechnung Nerd + Nerd = Liebe wirklich aufgehen?

The Big Bang Theory trifft auf Manga – eine herrlich durchgeknallte Rom-Com nicht nur für Nerds!
description.en: Narumi Momose has had it rough: every boyfriend she’s had dumped her once they found out she was an otaku, so she’s gone to great lengths to hide it. When a chance meeting at her new job with childhood friend, fellow otaku, and now coworker Hirotaka Nifuji almost gets her secret outed at work, she comes up with a plan to make sure he never speaks up. But he comes up with a counter-proposal: why doesn’t she just date him instead? In love, there are no save points. [Kodansha]
description.es:
"Cuando me preguntan qué clase de manga es Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku, como no estoy muy segura de si es un shojo, uno romántico o un manga cómico, al final explico que es un combate de amor entre integrantes de una especie diferente."

Fujita

Él, un gamer empedernido. Ella, una fujoshi. Ambos guardan sus secretos bajo su apariencia profesional. ¿Podrán mantener una relación sin revelarlos o sin que sus pasatiempos se interpongan entre ellos?
description.fr: Narumi et Hirotaka travaillent dans la même société. Ce sont tous deux des otaku. Ils ont chacun une passion dévorante pas toujours évidente à faire entendre aux autres. Peut-elle même être compatible avec une relation amoureuse ? Comprendre l'autre, l'accepter tel qu'il est, se montrer tel qu'on est vraiment... Misant sur ce point commun, «des otaku,» ils décident alors de sortir ensemble. Mais comme dans toutes les histoires d'amours, des interrogations et des doutes persistent. Leur passion va-t-elle les rapprocher ou les séparer? Heureusement les amis sont là pour en discuter mais aussi pour partager leur «otaku attitude.»
description.id: Kisah percintaan Narumi Momose amat sulit. Dia diputuskan oleh pacarnya setelah sang pacar tahu kalau Narumi adalah fujoshi. Akhirnya dia memutuskan untuk pindah kerja dan menyembunyikan kenyataan kalau dirinya seorang otaku di kantor barunya. Tapi di tempat kerja barunya dia malah bertemu dengan Hirotaka Nifuji, teman masa kecilnya yang tampan dan terampil tapi otaku gamer kelas berat. Mendengar keluhan Narumi mengenai otaku yang tidak akan berhasil dalam cinta, Hirotaka pun mengajak Narumi berpacaran sebagai sesama otaku!? “Kalau aku pasti akan menemanimu mengumpulkan material atau naik level. Aku nggak akan mengecewakanmu atau membuatmu menangis Ditambah lagi, aku bisa membantumu berjualan di comiket akhir pekan minggu depan.
description.it:
L'amore non è un gioco. Nemmeno quando è ad alto tasso nerd.

Narumi e Hirotaka: professione impiegati e... otaku hardcore. Tenere segreta la passione per manga, anime e videogiochi può essere utile per essere considerati normali, ma legarsi a chi la condivide sarà la strada più agevole per trovare il vero amore?
description.ja: 隠れ腐女子のOL・成海(なるみ)と、ルックス良く有能だが重度のゲーヲタである宏嵩(ひろたか)とのヲタク同士の不器用な恋愛を描いたラブコメディ。『次にくるマンガ大賞2014』の〝本にして欲しいWebマンガ部門〟第1位、pixiv内オリジナルコミックブックマーク数歴代1位の大人気作品が多数の描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化。
description.ko:
일본 현지 420만부 돌파!
이 만화가 대단해 2016 여자편 제1위, 2018년 일본 현지 TV애니메이션 방영 확정
게임 오타쿠 X 숨덕 부녀자

숨은 부녀자인 나루미는 새로 옮긴 직장에서 잘생기고 능력 있지만 심각한 게임 오타쿠 히로타카와 재회한다. 일단 연인이 되긴 했지만 오타쿠 친구이자 서툰 두 사람에게 연애는 어렵기만 하고. 오타쿠라면 고개를 끄덕일 시추에이션 가득하다. 오타쿠가 아닌 사람이라도 피식피식 웃다가 찡 하게 눈물이 고이게 되는, 픽시브에서 연재되었던 초인기 작품이 마침내 한국 정식 발간했다.
description.pl: Narumi Momose dobrze wie, że bycie sobą nie zawsze sprawdza się w romantycznych związkach. Faceci porzucali ją już z wielu powodów. Gdy jednak jeden z nich zakończył znajomość, bo dowiedział się, że Narumi jest otaku, miarka się przebrała. Nauczona doświadczeniem, w nowej pracy nikomu nie mówi więc o swoich zainteresowaniach. Przypadek sprawia, że w tej samej firmie pracuje jej kolega z gimnazjum, a zarazem zapalony fan gier, Hirotaka Nifuji. Aby upewnić się, że jej sekret jest bezpieczny, Narumi wyciąga go na obiad i przestrzega, aby wiedzę o jej wstydliwych upodobaniach zatrzymał dla siebie. On ma jednak inną propozycję - a może by tak zostali parą?
description.pt: Apesar de Narumi Momose esconder seu gosto por histórias yaoi, seu namorado descobre tal hobby e termina o relacionamento. Para renovar sua vida, ela decide mudar de trabalho e lá acaba encontrando seu amigo de infância, Hirotaka Nifuji, um viciado em video games, que por pouco não revela o segredo de sua amiga. Então, ela decide sugerir um plano para que ele nunca mais fale sobre o assunto, mas não contava com uma contraproposta: por que não começarem a namorar? Obcecados por seus interesses pessoais, será difícil para eles manterem um relacionamento.
description.ru: Наруми — обычная офисная работница... которая втайне ото всех рисует яойную мангу. Хиротака на хорошем счету в своей компании... и в то же время он — интроверт и хардкорный геймер. Читайте историю их неуклюжей любви в романтической комедии «Так сложно любить отаку»!
description.th: นารุมิ และ ฮิโรทากะ อดีตเพื่อนสมัยเด็กที่แต่เดิมทั้งสองนั้นก็มีความชื่นชอบในวัฒนธรรมการ์ตูนและเกมอยู่แล้ว ได้กลับมาพบเจอกันอีกครั้งในฐานะเพื่อนร่วมงาน แต่ทว่าความรู้สึกบางอย่างนั้นกลับไม่เหมือนเดิม... ความสัมพันธ์ของทั้งสองจะเป็นอย่างไร จะสามารถพัฒนาจากเพื่อนสมัยเด็กกลายเป็นคนรักได้หรือไม่ นี่คือเรื่องราวความรักที่สุดแสนจะโรแมนติคคอมเมดี้ ระหว่างหนุ่มสาวโอตาคุที่กำลังเริ่มต้นขึ้น
description.uk:
Як же важко будувати стосунки отаку... Багато людей не розуміють нас і цураються, косі погляди чекають на нас практично скрізь, куди б ми не йшли. Тому що ми не такі, як оточуючі, і їх це лякає... Але ж ми теж люди і теж хочемо любові і розуміння, відчувати, що ми не самотні...

Момосе Нарумі, 26 років, отаку, раптово дізнається, що тепер працюватиме з хлопцем, якого знає з початкової школи, але з вступу до старшої вона його не бачила... Що ж принесе це їй - самотній любительці чоловічого кохання та отоме-ігор , а що йому - "фахівцеві з відеоігор" Ніфудзі Хіротаке?

Адже... так складно любити отаку...
description.es-la: ¿Puede un oficinista que es secretamente un empedernido gamer y una mujer que es en secreto una fujoshi salir sin que sus pasatiempos se entrometan en su relación o sin revelar su secreto? Para Narumi Momose no ha sido fácil encontrar pareja, cada novio la ha dejado cuando se enteran de sus aficiones, eso la ha llevado a ocultar que es una fujoshi. Pero cuando entra a su nuevo trabajo, encuentra a su amigo de la infancia Hirotaka Nifuji quien sabe de su secreta afición. Ella pensará en un plan para que no diga su secreto, pero él le hace una contrapropuesta, ¿Por qué no empiezan a salir?
description.zh-hk: 極力隱瞞自己是個腐女的粉領族‧成海，在新公司與長相帥氣又能幹，但卻是個重度電玩宅的兒時玩伴宏嵩重逢了。為了方便，提議兩人乾脆交往，於是同為阿宅的成海與宏嵩正式成為男女朋友。而公司中的另一對情侶小柳和樺倉也是阿宅，四人經常在一起喝酒聊天。作者以自己身旁的朋友為靈感，描繪出狀況不斷又有趣的阿宅戀愛故事

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun

altTitles.es: Un cierto cañón de riel científico

altTitles.th: เรลกัน แฟ้มลับคดีวิทยาศาสตร์

altTitles.ja: とある科学の超電磁砲
とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

altTitles.ja: 追放する側の物語 仲間を追放したらパーティーが弱体化したけど、世界一を目指します。

altTitles.en: The Story Of The Banisher Side After Banishing The Party Member - The Party Was Weakened, But We Aim To Be The Best In The World

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Suru Gawa no Monogatari - Nakama wo Tsuihou Shitara Party ga Jakutaika Shitakedo, Sekaiichi wo Mezashimasu.

description.en:
"Exile" and you're weakened!? A "do-over" fantasy of a failed party!
"Stardust", an up-and-coming party, in order to aim even higher, expels Est, a “burden” of the party members.
But as a result, the party is weakened and Est is awakened!

In this "Serves You Right!" situation, a swordsman with zero motivation and zero pride rises to the occasion!
This is a story about the "Aftermath" of the "Side that Banished Him".

title.en: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou

altTitles.ja: 最強スキル「命乞い」で悔しいけど無双しちゃう元魔王様の世界征服活動

altTitles.en: Her Strongest Ability Is Begging for Mercy, the Frustrating World Conquest Adventures of a Former Demon King

altTitles.vi: Hành Trình Chinh Phục Thế Giới Đầy Nhục Nhã của Cựu Ma Vương Với Kỹ Năng Thượng Thừa "Cầu Xin Tha Mạng"

description.en:
Village girl Chelsea, who is beloved by everyone, is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King.
However, when she reincarnated, for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited, and she was forced to live as a normal human being.

Humiliating days continued until one day, the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate, who did not realize her true identity, Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then, a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?
description.ja: 誰からも愛される村娘のチェルシーは、実は転生した元魔王。 しかし、転生の際になぜか魔力もスキルも引き継げず、ただの人間としての生活を強いられることに…。 そんな屈辱の日々が続くある日、村に魔王軍の残党が略奪に現れる。 自分の正体に気づかない元部下に追い詰められ、絶体絶命のピンチに陥るチェルシーだが、ついにそこでスキルが発現！ そのスキルの名は――「命乞い」!?

description.en:
The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. 
He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. 
He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.

title.en: Sekai ga hajimaru asa ni umi wo mito

altTitles.ja: 世界が始まる朝に海を見た

altTitles.en: I saw the sea on the morning the world began

altTitles.vi: Thế Giới Ngày Đại Dương Xuất Hiện

description.en:
Ao lives with his father, who has a bad drinking habit, in a town with a beautiful view of the sea. He spends his time trying to be as inconspicuous as possible, both at his high school and at home, as if he's holding his breath. One day, while on the way home from school, he meets Minato smoking a cigarette on the station platform. Minato, who works at a bento shop in spite of his blonde hair and piercings, can't stand the fact that Ao eats food from the convenience store every day, so he offers him a suggestion: "Instead of making you a bento every day, comment on my cooking"...?
The story of two young men who meet in a seaside town, and their once-in-a-lifetime true love.

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...

title.en: I Turned Off The Pain Perception Setting!

altTitles.en: I Said I Turned off The Pain Perception Setting!
I'm Telling You, I Already Turned Off The Pain Perception Setting!

description.en:
**Pain Perception 0, Capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'.
I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off.

Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace.

Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally ill hero throwing herself for the world!

I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!

To save one, she'll kill the other.
A miraculous, 1-in-200,000 chance birth of conjoined twins. The probability of their survival? Less than 5%. Born with just one heart between the two of them, the Kang sisters face a sinister fate: for one to survive, the other must die. Their mother faces a horrible choice. How would you decide?
description.pt-br:
Para salvar um, ela matará o outro. 
Um nascimento milagroso, com probabilidade de 1 em 200.000, de gêmeos siameses. A probabilidade de sua sobrevivência? Menos de 5%. Nascidas com apenas um coração entre as duas, as irmãs Kang enfrentam um destino sinistro: para uma sobreviver, a outra deve morrer. A mãe delas enfrenta uma escolha horrível. Como você decidiria?

altTitles.ja: 神様です。サービスするよ

altTitles.en: I'm a God. I'll serve you.

altTitles.vi: Tôi là một vị thần. Tôi sẽ giúp bạn
Thần và cậu bé u ám

description.en:
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/236717)

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".

title.en: My Job is Appraiser, but What is The [God Eye]? Living Freely with The World's Greatest Elementary Level Job

altTitles.ja: 職業は鑑定士ですが【神眼】ってなんですか？　～世界最高の初級職で自由にいきたい～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shokugyou wa Kanteishi Desu ga [Shingan] tte Nandesu ka? ~ Sekai Saikou no Shokyuushoku de Jiyuu ni Ikitai ~ ​

description.en:
Touri, a High schooler who was Transported to another World, was immediately banished due to his Elementary Level Job, 'Appraiser'.
But there's more to his Job...!? The Curtains of the Other World Fantasy  Survival using Appraiser Skill Opens!
Kon lives in a world that bugs out regularly. But with Kasane, a researcher who studies these phenomena, he knows that each day will at least be interesting!

Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

altTitles.zh: 想不通可爱老婆为什么要与我结婚

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng bùtōng kě'ài lǎopó wèishéme yào yǔ wǒ jiéhūn

description.en: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
description.ja: ウチのかわいすぎる妻は、なぜ超平凡な自分と結婚したのか――!?　自己評価激低な夫・槌岡直継は、妻・憙乃への疑念から“マリッジグレー”に陥っていた！　一方の憙乃は、日々溢れまくる直継へのLOVEを抑えるのに一生懸命で…!?　相思相愛な新婚夫婦の、激甘かけ違いラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: Minha esposa é muito suspeita! Eu não entendo por que ela se casou com alguém como eu? Por que uma mulher bonita, inteligente, e considerada como a Yoshino se casaria com alguém comum como Naotsugu!! Não há casamento azul aqui, apenas um suspeito caso de casamento cinza!!

description.en: The elite private tutor, Min Jiang Xi, who is good at "pretending", managed to clinch the CEO Qin Zhan as a client. He, who hates women flocking towards him, warns that "he simply lacks a tutor, not a girlfriend". As he instructed, she is courteous and distant, never crossing the boundaries. But one year later, a drunk Qin Zhan states that "I won’t force you to like me, so don’t force me to not like you. I can’t do it". Can she, who doesn’t believe in love, find it with him?
description.fr: Min Jiang Xi, professeur particulier pour l'élite, réussit à prouver au PDG Qin Zhan qu'elle serait le professeur parfait à embaucher. Mais cet homme voue une profonde aversion aux femmes qui s'accrochent à lui et la prévient qu'il lui manque simplement une tutrice et non pas une petite amie. Elle s'y attèle en ne franchissant jamais les limites. Mais un an plus tard, Qin Zhan ivre, lui déclare son amour. Elle, qui ne croit pas à l'amour, pourra-t-elle le trouver avec lui ?

description.en: Younghee just wants to find a nice guy, earn a promotion, and get her favorite celeb's autograph. But at work, she's ignored as a humble office worker. When she accidentally drinks a powerful medicine, it not only makes her totally gorgeous but also gives her superhuman senses! Now that she's appointed to Won, the wealthy and handsome heir of an entertainment company, can Younghee's new abilities help him take back the reins from his scheming uncle? How long will it take for Won to discover she's no ordinary secretary?

title.en: High School Girl at the Convenience Store

altTitles.en: A High School Girl & A Convenience Store

description.en:
A yuri manhwa about a tough high school girl and a shy convenience store worker. Even if it's just running errands, just being able to catch a glimpse of her makes it all worthwhile.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3698011)

title.en: Makyou Seikatsu: Gakeppuchi Boukensha ga Hikikomoru ni wa Hirosugiru

altTitles.ja: 魔境生活 〜崖っぷち冒険者が引きこもるには広すぎる〜

description.en:
After being expelled from his family home, our main character tries his hand at becoming an adventurer, only to find out that things aren't quite as they seem. Determined to change his fate, and with the money he's saved up, he heads out to purchase a plot of land in the remote, unexplored wilderness, with the intent of forging his perfect new life. Little does he know, this expanse is infamous as the 'Demonic Realm,' a treacherous territory brimming with savage plants and creatures!

But navigating the daily trials of this life-threatening wilderness may prove be a challenge. In his journey of growth, an array of inhabitants, each driven by their motives, decide to follow him, bringing vibrancy back into his life. However, unseen powers resolute in preventing the Demonic Realm from being conquered begin to surface... Will he be able to endure, triumph, and make this land his new home?
description.ja:
実家を追い出されて冒険者になるも、堕落の一途を辿る主人公の青年。このままでは駄目だと一念発起した彼は、超辺境にある土地を購入して理想の住み処を作ろうとする。しかしその土地は『魔境』と呼ばれる、凶暴な動植物がうごめく超危険地帯であった！
日々命がけのサバイバルを生き抜き、徐々に逞しくなってゆく青年。そんな彼のもとに訳アリな住人たちも集まり生活が賑やかになるが、魔境を放っておかない勢力も現れて……！？

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

There is also an alternative version:
[A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e/a-parallel-world-with-a-1-39-male-to-female-ratio-is-unexpectedly-normal-r18)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

description.en:
Become the strongest, at the World's End.  
  
At the end of the world there will be ' Stairs', and at the end there will be everything.  
Go beyond the limits and be born as the strongest person at the end of the world!

In the office, Taejoon reigns supreme as the "Cupid of Sales," renowned for successfully pairing colleagues thanks to his ability to see the color of people's auras. Unfortunately, he himself has been single his entire life. But everything changes when he drunkenly kisses the new recruit, Hongyeon, which leads to a sizzling night at a motel. And then Taejoon discovers something fascinating - Hongyeon's aura is a mesmerizing rainbow! As Hongyeon boldly pursues him, Taejoon's shyness clashes with their steamy connection. Now they must navigate a somewhat clumsy and spicy office romance, where colors will fly in more ways than one!

This manga tells the legacy of Mitsuyo Maeda a Brazilian naturalized as Otávio Maeda, who was a Japanese judōka (judo expert) and prizefighter in no holds barred competitions. He was also known as Count Combat or Conde Koma in Spanish and Portuguese, a nickname he picked up in Spain in 1908. Along with Antônio Soshihiro Satake (another naturalized Brazilian), he pioneered judo in Brazil, the United Kingdom, and other countries.  
  
Maeda was fundamental to the development of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, including through his teaching of Carlos Gracie and others of the Gracie family. He was also a promoter of Japanese emigration to Brazil. Maeda won more than 2,000 professional fights in his career. His accomplishments led to him being called the "toughest man who ever lived" and being referred to as the father of Brazilian Jiu-jitsu.

"You may lie with me, human."
On the day of his new vet clinic's opening, Jung finds a sickly lizard at his doorstep. But the lizard soon turns into a human... and it turns out he's the Dragon King's son! Can the arrogant yet sexy Prince Woonwoo convince Jung to help him become a full-fledged dragon through intimacy?
description.es: El veterinario Choe Jeong finalmente hizo realidad su sueño al abrir su propio hospital para mascotas. En el primer día de apertura, Choe Jeong recogió un lagarto fuera de su puerta … "Soy el hijo menor del Rey Dragón". El lagarto … ¿se ha convertido en humano? ¿Y sigue diciendo que es el hijo del Rey Dragón? "¿Quieres ser mi príncipe?" ¿Qué le dirá Choe Jeong a este misterioso príncipe?

description.en: Even angels give into temptation. Once God’s right-hand warrior, the archangel Agnes has succumbed to desire and formed a contract with Lucifer, the ruler of demons. Now a fallen angel, she poses as a simple taxi driver and patrols the bustling city of Seoul during the midnight hours. Cursed by the king of hell to seek souls for her life force, Agnes pursues depraved individuals who prey upon innocents for their own pleasure, and uses their carnal desires against them. But when her past comes back to haunt her, a tantalizing game of cat and mouse involving vengeful entities ensues.

A girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, the 'soulmate' decided to marry a man at the age of 28 because she did not want to live an "abnormal life". Only after leaving her to marry a man, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

Mismatched lovers Eunsung and Hyunwoo face a bizarre twist of fate. When Hyunwoo abruptly ends their relationship, Eunsung finds himself committing the darkest of crimes. However, Eunsung wakes up in a world where the cold body in his arms isn’t Hyunwoo’s and instead, he’s the one who's been killed… In this surreal switch, Eunsung realizes a chilling truth—their destinies are entwined in a dark cycle of love and murder. Despite this deadly paradox, Eunsung still believes they are meant to be together, and this time he won’t let anything get in his way…

Shin Jae-Won attended the World Camp hosted by the Spanish King as a tennis player in his Junior Year.  
  
Jae-Won meets Javier, an unusually conspicuous participant in the World Camp.  
  
“When are we going to practice?”  
  
There are always people (especially women) around him.  
  
Then, Jae-Won, who happened to stumble upon Javier one night during practice, ended up spending the night alone. The more he faced his whimsical, pure side, the more his heart began to beat…  
  
“I hate this kind of things…”  
  
Jae-Won’s first love ended as fast as a Siesta.  
  
A decade later, they meet again Spain.

Having lived as the second son of a temple, worshipped as a deity, and being a sheltered boy capable of transforming into a snake, Sei finally decides he's had enough of this life, and sets out to run away from home! Not being used to human society, Sei gets worn out and escapes to a grassy field where he meets and is helped by Murasaki, the reptile enthusiast college student. As the sheltered boy who longed to be "normal", Sei takes this chance to befriend the unfriendly and hard-to-read Murasaki, but their co-habitation life is riddled with misunderstandings…?! The two experience their first love together in a hot and cute love comedy!

**Note:** Chapter 5 (Shisuke ga Nattenai!) is not scanlated.

title.en: Who Saw the Peacock Dance in the Jungle?

altTitles.ja: クジャクのダンス、誰が見た？

altTitles.ja-ro: Kujaku no Dance, Dare ga Mita?

altTitles.en: Who saw the peacock dance in the jungle?

altTitles.vi: Là ai đã chứng kiến điệu múa khổng tước?

description.en:
A former cop was murdered on a snowy Christmas Eve night. The suspect was arrested & the case appeared to be closed.

However, a letter left by the murdered former cop to his daughter sets the case back on track. It said, "If any of the following persons are arrested or prosecuted...they are falsely accused." And on that list was the name of the suspect who was arrested for killing her father...

altTitles.ja: あかりと彼はなやましい

description.en:
"Can you, a straight man, fall in love with me?"  
  
His two (straight) friends got together. The openly gay high schooler Akari is somehow displeased with that. Is it envy? Or is it jealousy? …… What the hell.  
  
"Someday, I'll definitely find someone to love too…!"  
  
Having eagerly gone to a gay bar, the one he meets there is an irritating adult wielding a fair argument!?
description.pt-br:
"Você, um homem hétero, pode se apaixonar por mim?"

Seus dois amigos (heterossexuais) ficaram juntos. O estudante assumidamente gay Akari está de alguma forma descontente com isso. É inveja? Ou é ciúme? …… Que diabos.

"Algum dia, com certeza encontrarei alguém para amar também...!"

Tendo ido avidamente a um bar gay, aquele que ele conhece lá é um adulto irritante com um argumento justo!?

description.kk: "Айырбас терминал" - Елде пайда болған құпия әрі қанды терминал жайлы оқиға. Бұл терминалдың ерекшелігі сізге көптеген ақша ұсына алады, бірақ оның орнына ол адамның дене органдарына айрбас жасау арқылы. Бұл ел үшін басында өте құпия өлімдер болып табылды. Басты кейіпкер осы істі полициядан бұрын ерте өзі аяқтағысы келеді.

altTitles.ja: だれでも抱けるキミが好き

altTitles.vi: Crush Của Tôi Là Một Đứa Lẳng Lơ

altTitles.en: I Like You Who Can Have Sex With Anyone
I like you who can have sex anyone.

altTitles.es-la: Me Gustas tú, que Puedes tener Sexo con Cualquiera

altTitles.pt-br: Eu goste de você, que pode fazer sexo com qualquer um

description.en:
Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Comic Days](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437), [Magazine Pocket](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)
description.ja: 童貞高校生のゴトウが好きになったのはセックス大好きなギャル・アガワさん。ある日の放課後、彼女が同級生とセックスしているところを見てしまって──。
description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).
description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.
description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

description.en:
A story about a delinquent boy turned into a violent magical girl.  
  
Note: Season 2 is being uploaded to the author's weibo page.  
Refer to this [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/w41PzRvz) for details and links to the season 2 raws.

title.en: Umi de Hirotta Kimi ni Sasagu

altTitles.en: For You, Whom I Picked Up On the Beach

altTitles.ja: 海で拾ったきみに捧ぐ

description.en: The popular novelist in a bad mood because of his slump finds a young man naked at the beach. Furthermore, that man seems to have lost his memory?!
